intro: Othonna capensis, commonly known as the Cape othonna, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Asteraceae and is characterized by its dense, woolly foliage and showy yellow flowers. The plant typically grows in rocky, well-drained soils and is often found in coastal and mountainous regions. Othonna capensis is a perennial shrub that can reach heights of up to 1 meter. Its unique appearance and adaptability make it a popular choice for rock gardens and xeriscaping.
